ing: 2 fluid ounces Irish cream liqueur (such as BaileysÂ®)
2 fluid ounces coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or more to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste
des: "This was created by my daughter and enjoyed by many. Try it your friends will be asking for the recipe. Adjust quantities according to company."
ins: Blend cream, milk, vodka, rum, Irish cream liqueur, coffee-flavored liqueur, ice cream, nutmeg, and cinnamon together in a blender until smooth.
